author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-1047: change MergePolicy & MergeScheduler from interface to abstract base class to have future freedom to add default methods without breaking backwards compatibility

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-843: change public -> package protected for two advanced static methods on SegmentReader used only during merging

author: cziegeler
msg: Start implementing dynamic lookup mechanism for script engines.

author: gsim
msg: Ensure browsers are always serviced on the serializers dispatch thread to avoid concurrent servicing threads interfering with each other.

author: jacopoc
msg: Removed old and unused code that was treating the ruleActionSeqId field as a numeric field instead as a string.
